## Subsetting 

Base R: Lots of brackets! [[ ]]\
Tidyverse: `slice()` `select()`\

Example 1: Subsetting the first three rows\
`UNpop[c(1, 2, 3),]` `slice(UNpop, n = 1:3)`

Example 2: Subsetting the first three rows of the year variable\
`UNpop[1:3, "year"]` `select(slice(UNpop, 1:3), year)`\

Example 3: Pipe operator %>%\
`UNpop %>%`
    `slice(1:3) %>%`
    `select(year)`
